name: BOOKBINDERS RULER GAUGES in acrylic set
description:
~COMING SOON~
These acrylic ruler gauges will save you endless time measuring joints between boards, turn-ins, allowances and all kinds of standard measuring tasks. 
Being acrylic, they don't stick to glues, you can see through them, and they have crisp edges.

So handy. 
They will be available in an imperial set of 1/4,1/2, 3/4 and 1".
The photo is of the prototype. The final product will be uploaded when the design and custom manufacture for the Sago bindery is complete.

name: BOOKBINDERS GAUGE handy measuring tool
description:
14 different measurements - perfect for checking small measurements in case-making, boxmaking. Frosted acrylic with black numbers and lines for clarity on light and dark coloured paper. Grid lines are spaced at the inch with increments of 1/8, 1/4 and 1/2 inches.

You really will want to keep this little rippa in your apron or at the workbench, it is so handy.

name: BOOKBINDERS GLUE BRUSHES from Sweden
description: Round Bookbinders glue brush with ergonomic soft-grip handle for comfortable grip. Natural hog bristles for high durability and capacity. Their construction is free of metal parts and will not rust over time. Also feature a handy brush rest and pail hanger. These brushes are sure to become your best glue-buddy. Priced from $20 for the 20mm, to $50 for the whopper 50mm.

name: STOCKMANS ALBUM ~ henna
description:
Traditionally, the Stockman's book was wrapped in leather to keep pages from being marked by their oilskin coat - used to paint, write and record thoughts to keep boredom away.  

This album is protected by soft chocolate leather that smells and feels as inviting as it looks. Nostalgic and tactile. 

The perfect size for your favourite set of 4x6" photographs
antiqued pages with hand stamped pigment ink design, reinforced along the spine in linen, and adorned with a 19th century postcard, to get you into the mood.
